title: Plat 5 ADC main LFT
body: Add me in game if anybody wants a player for ranked teams.

replies.body:
Hey, i know i'm not plat or anything all i'm asking is if you want a mechanical player in your team your support or mid laner would have to tell me where to go or what tower to destroy i have  been playing a specific champion for 3 years now which is Vayne but i have 4 mains which are in order 
1. Vayne
2. Lucian
3. Caitlyn / Kalista ( still haven't decided yet )

i am actually silver 5 and to be honest i recently got out of bronze i have a friend that is my support and we never lost a game since bronze 1 except for 2 and now im in silver 1 promos and he is in b3 promos we are really good together. i have a youtube channel if you want to check that out to see if im good or something but im just saying my vayne plays there arent really as good now anyway thanks for your time for reading this bye :D this is my youtube channel : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzKmv8Hh-Fp-3FpfGedM-qA ( Also my user used to be NEONG4MER101 )
